item.title: GitHub Pages绑定个人域名
item.description:
<h2 id="1-购买域名" class="heading-element"><span>1 购买域名</span>
 <a href="#1-%e8%b4%ad%e4%b9%b0%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>如阿里云、腾讯云、华为云等都可以购买域名，同一个域名不同厂商的价格可能不一样。</p>
<h2 id="2-域名解析" class="heading-element"><span>2 域名解析</span>
 <a href="#2-%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d%e8%a7%a3%e6%9e%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>以阿里云为例，进入<code>域名控制台</code>，解析新购买的域名。添加下面两条记录，记录值填写Github Pages的原始域名<code>user-name.github.io</code>，记录类型选择<code>CNAME</code>，比如自己的域名是<code>hxhuxin.top</code>，那么主机记录<code>www</code>对应的网址就是<code>www.hxhuxin.top</code>，主机记录<code>@</code>对应的网址是<code>hxhuxin.top</code>。添加完两条记录后，需等待十几分钟。</p>
 <img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/aliyun.png" alt="aliyun" style="zoom:50%;" />
<h2 id="3-github-pages绑定个人域名" class="heading-element"><span>3 Github Pages绑定个人域名</span>
 <a href="#3-github-pages%e7%bb%91%e5%ae%9a%e4%b8%aa%e4%ba%ba%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入自己博客对应的仓库，打开【Settings】-【 Pages】， 在<code>Custom domain</code>下填写自己的域名后点击<code>Save</code>，<code>Enforce HTTPS</code>选项可以勾选上，强制使用<code>HTTPS</code>。</p>
<blockquote><p>点击<code>Save</code>后可能提示绑定不成功，十几分钟后再试一下即可，域名解析需要等待一定的时间。</p>
</blockquote><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/github-custom-domain.png" alt="github-custom-domain" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/github-custom-domain.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/github-custom-domain.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/github-custom-domain.png?size=large 2x" data-title="github-custom-domain" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

item.title: GitHub+jsDelivr+PicGo搭建免费图床
item.description:
<h2 id="1-生成一个github-token" class="heading-element"><span>1 生成一个Github Token</span>
 <a href="#1-%e7%94%9f%e6%88%90%e4%b8%80%e4%b8%aagithub-token" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入Github主页，点击右上角个人头像，【Settings】-【Developer settings】-【Personal access tokens】-【Generate new token】，如下图：</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/Github-Create-Token.png" alt="Github-Create-Token" style="zoom:50%;" />
<p><code>Note</code>可自定义，勾选<code>repo</code>。生成Token后，复制Token，之后该Token将不可见，如下图：</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/Github-Token-List.png" alt="Github-Token-List" style="zoom:50%;" />
<h2 id="2-配置picgo" class="heading-element"><span>2 配置PicGo</span>
 <a href="#2-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aepicgo" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="https://github.com/Molunerfinn/PicGo"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">PicGo</a>安装完成后，打开图床设置，配置GitHub图床，如下图：</p>
<blockquote><p>Tips: Mac系统打开PicGo后并不会看到PicGo的主界面，在菜单栏中找到PicGo图标，右键点击“打开详细窗口”即可打开PicGo主界面。</p>
</blockquote><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/PicGo.png" alt="PicGo" style="zoom:50%;" />
<ul>
<li>设定仓库名：格式是<code>用户名/仓库名</code>，可以新建一个GitHub仓库，专门用作图床</li>
<li>设定分支名：默认分支main即可</li>
<li>设定Token：复制刚刚生成的Token到此处</li>
<li>指定储存路径：如果不填，则之后图片会上传到仓库的根目录下，也可以指定存储路径（路径最后要加<code>/</code>）</li>
<li>设定自定义域名：基于jsDelivr搭建图床，则域名格式为：<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version</a>，如<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main</a>，设置完成后，即可通过<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version/file"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version/file</a>格式访问文件了，如<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/PicGo.png"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/PicGo.png</a></li>
</ul>
<p>配置完PicGo后，之后就可以通过PicGo快速将图片上传至GitHub仓库了。图片成功上传后，PicGo会自动将图片链接复制到粘贴板。PicGo常用的操作是：选定需要上传的图片，<code>Command+C</code>复制图片；<code>Command+Shift+P</code>上传刚刚复制的图片，<code>Command+V</code>获得图片链接。更多PicGo操作可自行探索。</p>

item.title: Jekyll博客中基于LeanCloud统计文章阅读量
item.description:
<h2 id="1-配置leancloud" class="heading-element"><span>1 配置LeanCloud</span>
 <a href="#1-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aeleancloud" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>进入LeanCloud官网<a href="https://www.leancloud.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.leancloud.cn/</a>，注册或登录账号。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>创建应用，应用名称可自行设定。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png" alt="Create-App" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-App" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<ul>
<li>创建Class，【数据存储】-【结构化数据】-【创建Class】，Class名称与后面相关代码有关，为减少不必要的麻烦，建议将Class名称设置为<code>Counter</code>，其它设置项默认值即可。</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-2.png" alt="Create-Class" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-2.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-Class" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>以后每篇文章的点击量等信息都可在该Class下查看。</p>
<ul>
<li>设置安全域名，【设置】-【安全中心】-【Web安全域名】，填写自己博客的域名即可，在本地调试阶段还可以添加<code>http://127.0.0.1:4000</code></li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-3.png" alt="Web安全域名" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-3.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-3.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Web安全域名" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<ul>
<li>查看<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>，【设置】-【应用凭证】-【Credentials】，<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>在后面的配置中会用到。</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png" alt="Credentials" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Credentials" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<ul>
<li>安全设置，【设置】-【安全中心】-【服务开关】，由于<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>会出现在博客的配置文件中，相当于是公开的，所以有必要进行安全设置，关闭不需要的服务。</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-5.png" alt="服务开关" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-5.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-5.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="服务开关" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<h2 id="2-修改博客配置文件" class="heading-element"><span>2 修改博客配置文件</span>
 <a href="#2-%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>需要修改或新增的文件如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _config.yml
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _includes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">│ └── leancloud-analytics.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">└── _layouts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> ├── default.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> └── post.html</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>

item.title: Jekyll博客中添加Gitalk评论系统
item.description:
<p>Gitalk评论系统的效果图如下：</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/gitalk.png" alt="gitalk" style="zoom:50%;" />
<p>Gitalk每篇文章的评论对应于Github上的一个Issues，配置完Gitalk后，进入博客对应的Github仓库的Issues，就可以管理评论数据了，下面来配置Gitalk评论系统。</p>
<h2 id="1-创建github-oauth-apps" class="heading-element"><span>1 创建Github OAuth Apps</span>
 <a href="#1-%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%bagithub-oauth-apps" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入Github主页，点击右上角个人头像，【Settings】-【Developer settings】-【OAuth Apps】-【New OAuth App】，可看到如下界面：</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/github-oauth-app.png" alt="github-oauth-app" style="zoom:50%;" />
<ul>
<li>Application name: 应用的名字，自定义</li>
<li>Homepage URL: 填写自己博客的URL，如<a href="https://star927.github.io/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://star927.github.io/</a></li>
<li>Application description: 应用描述，选填项</li>
<li>Authorization callback URL: 与Homepage URL一样即可</li>
</ul>
<p>如果Github Pages已经绑定了个人域名，则<code>Homepage URL</code>和<code>Authorization callback URL</code>需要填写自己的域名，如<a href="https://hxhuxin.top/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://hxhuxin.top/</a></p>
<h2 id="2-在jekyll中配置gitalk" class="heading-element"><span>2 在Jekyll中配置Gitalk</span>
 <a href="#2-%e5%9c%a8jekyll%e4%b8%ad%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aegitalk" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>需要修改文件如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _config.yml
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _includes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">│ └── head.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">└── _layouts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> └── post.html</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="_configyml" class="heading-element"><span>_config.yml</span>
 <a href="#_configyml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在<code>_config.yml</code>文件中添加以下代码：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-yml" data-lang="yml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">gitalk</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">enable</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c"># 总开关，控制gitalk功能是否开启</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">clientId</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">申请的OAuth App的Client ID </span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">clientSecret</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">申请的OAuth App的Client ID</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">repo</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">博客对应的仓库名称</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">owner</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">自己的Github用户名</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">admin</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">自己的Github用户名</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">distractionFreeMode</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c"># 若设置为true，则当在评论框输入时，周围区域会变暗</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>repo是自己博客对应的仓库的名称，如<code>star927.github.io</code>，而不是该仓库的URL</p>
<h3 id="headhtml" class="heading-element"><span>head.html</span>
 <a href="#headhtml" class="heading-mark">

<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">

</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if page.layout == &#39;post&#39; and site.gitalk.enable %}{% endraw %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">link</span> <span class="na">rel</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;stylesheet&#34;</span> <span class="na">href</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gitalk@1/dist/gitalk.css&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="posthtml" class="heading-element"><span>post.html</span>
 <a href="#posthtml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在<code>_layouts/post.html</code>文件的适当位置添加以下代码，这样每篇博客最后都会有Gitalk评论区。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;gitalk-container&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gitalk@1/dist/gitalk.min.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kr">const</span> <span class="nx">gitalk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Gitalk</span> <span class="p">({</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">id</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">location</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">pathname</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">clientID</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.clientId }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">clientSecret</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.clientSecret }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">repo</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.repo }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">owner</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.owner }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">admin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.admin }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">distractionFreeMode</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.distractionFreeMode }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">gitalk</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;gitalk-container&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span> </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上述步骤完成后，在评论区如果出现问题 <strong>Error: Not Found.</strong>（如下图），请仔细检查代码是否有误。</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/gitalk-error-not-found.png" alt="gitalk-error-not-found" style="zoom:50%;" />
<h2 id="3-初始化gitalk" class="heading-element"><span>3 初始化Gitalk</span>
 <a href="#3-%e5%88%9d%e5%a7%8b%e5%8c%96gitalk" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>正确完成上述步骤后，在评论区可看到以下内容，点击<code>使用Github登录</code>即可。</p>
<blockquote><p>必须将上述代码的修改提交到Github上，通过<a href="https://your-user-name.github.io/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://your-user-name.github.io/</a>或者自己已绑定的域名访问自己的博客，再点击<code>使用Github登录</code>，而不是在本地服务器<a href="http://127.0.0.1:4000/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">http://127.0.0.1:4000/</a>点击<code>使用Github登录</code>。</p>
</blockquote><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/gitalk-init.png" alt="gitalk-init" style="zoom:50%;" />

item.title: Jekyll博客中添加Valine评论系统
item.description:
<p>Valine评论系统的效果图如下：</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/Valine.png" alt="Valine" style="zoom:50%;" />
<p>下面一步步来配置Valine评论系统</p>
<h2 id="1-配置leancloud" class="heading-element"><span>1 配置LeanCloud</span>
 <a href="#1-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aeleancloud" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>进入LeanCloud官网<a href="https://www.leancloud.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.leancloud.cn/</a>，注册/登录账号。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>创建应用，应用名称可自行设定。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png" alt="Create-App" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-App" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<ul>
<li>查看<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>，【设置】-【应用凭证】-【Credentials】，<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>在后面的配置中会用到。</li>
</ul>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png" alt="Credentials" srcset="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=small, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/LeanCloud-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Credentials" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<h2 id="2-修改博客配置文件" class="heading-element"><span>2 修改博客配置文件</span>
 <a href="#2-%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>在<code>_config.yml</code>文件中添加以下代码：</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-yml" data-lang="yml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">valine</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">enable</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_id</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_key</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>enable</code>是一个总开关，控制Valine评论功能是否开启，<code>app_id</code>和<code>app_key</code>对应LeanCloud的<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>。
更多配置项参见官方文档：<a href="https://valine.js.org/configuration.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://valine.js.org/configuration.html</a></p>
<ul>
<li>创建<code>valine.html</code>文件，放在<code>_includes</code>文件夹下，代码如下：</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#39;//unpkg.com/valine/dist/Valine.min.js&#39;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;vcomments&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Valine</span><span class="p">({</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">el</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;#vcomments&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">appId</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.valine.app_id }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">appKey</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.valine.app_key }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">})</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>在需要添加Valine评论的地方添加以下代码，如<code>_layouts/post.html</code>文件</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if site.valine.enable %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {% include valine.html %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>至此Valine评论系统配置完毕。打开对应的LeanCloud应用，在【数据存储】-【结构化数据】-【Comment&lt;/&gt;】中可查看和管理所有评论数据。</p>
<img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/Valine-Comment.png" alt="Valine-Comment" style="zoom:50%;" />
<h2 id="3-配置valine邮件提醒功能" class="heading-element"><span>3 配置Valine邮件提醒功能</span>
 <a href="#3-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aevaline%e9%82%ae%e4%bb%b6%e6%8f%90%e9%86%92%e5%8a%9f%e8%83%bd" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>参见<a href="https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin</a></p>
